darwin-amd64.description: If you are using Apple Mac OS, use this one.
darwin-amd64.name: Mac OS

jar.description: This will run on any system that java 8 supports. Recommended only if you know what you are doing.
jar.name: Cross Platform (jar)

jar_portable.description: The portable jar keeps all files it uses in the same directory as the jar. This is great for running from a USB stick.
jar_portable.name: Portable (jar)

linux-amd64.description: For use on 64 bit linux (you may need to allow perssion to execute it)
linux-amd64.name: Linux 64 Bit

linux-linux-386.description: For use on 32 bit linux (you may need to allow perssion to execute it)
linux-linux-386.name: Linux 32 Bit

windows-386.description: If the 64bit version doesnt work, try this one.
windows-386.name: Windows 32 Bit

windows-amd64.description: If you are using windows, this is the version that you will most likey need.
windows-amd64.name: Windows 64 Bit
